video.title: Mixology
video.synopsis: Sparks fly -- and fizzle -- as five men and five women cross paths over the course of a one evening at a chic Manhattan hot spot.

episodes.synopsis: Newly single after a split with his fiancee of a decade, Tom reluctantly dives into the dating pool and meets Maya, a brash and beautiful attorney.
episodes.title: Tom & Maya

episodes.synopsis: It's instant chemistry when sweet, innocent Liv meets Ron, a suave and sophisticated Brit. Jessica and Fab compete for the attention of a bartender.
episodes.title: Liv & Ron

episodes.synopsis: Assuming she'll be an easy conquest, Bruce pursues Jessica, a single mom from New Jersey. Liv gets in trouble by indulging her curiosity about Ron.
episodes.title: Bruce & Jessica

episodes.synopsis: Hopeless romantics Kacey and Cal meet and instantly assume they are soul mates; Jessica and Fab have an upsetting encounter; Liv breaks the rules.
episodes.title: Cal & Kacey

episodes.synopsis: Jessica and Fab continue to compete for handsome bartender Dominic; Tom plots to make a move on Maya; Cal and Bruce go to another part of the bar.
episodes.title: Fab & Jessica & Dominic

episodes.synopsis: Things are going very well for Tom and Maya until Tom's ex shows up; Liv realizes she needs flirting assistance; Kacey and Ron meet sexy firemen.
episodes.title: Tom & Maya II

episodes.synopsis: The mutual hatred between Bruce and Fab could be something more. Tom gets into a fight at the bar. Jessica shows a racy photo of Ron to Liv and Maya.
episodes.title: Bruce & Fab

episodes.synopsis: Jessica tries to retrieve a nude photo she sent to Ron. Maya gets an offer she can't refuse. Bruce meets a woman who is attracted to redheads.
episodes.title: Jessica & Ron

episodes.synopsis: Kacey inquires about their relationship status and is shocked by Dominic's response. Maya and Fab try to help an inebriated Liz.
episodes.title: Dominic & Kacey

episodes.synopsis: Liv faces reality when her fiance shows up at the bar. Bruce is hurt to learn that Tom and Cal watched the new season of "Downton Abbey" without him.
episodes.title: Liv & Jim

episodes.synopsis: Bruce asks Maya to fake-flirt with him just to make Jessica jealous. Fab spots her attractive gynecologist and weighs the pros and cons of dating him.
episodes.title: Bruce & Maya

episodes.synopsis: Last call and while trying to get Maya home, Tom and Liv realize they've made a connection. Bruce panics, thinking Jessica is going home with Dominic.
episodes.title: Last Call

episodes.synopsis: Tom faces his last chance to invite Maya home. Bruce is torn between Jessica and his redhead groupie. Liv must make a last-minute choice about Ron.
episodes.title: Closing Time
